name: Political Persuasion Via Literature Simulator 4 Colonial Period ++ Definitive Edition

description: Created for an American Literature class project, in "Political Persuasion Via Literature Simulator 4 Colonial Period ++ Definitive Edition" you will propagate your political convictions by chucking your persuasive pamphlet in their faces.
